title: 游대 Local CI/CD Lab Environment on Ubuntu Host
description: This document describes the setup of a fully local CI/CD lab environment on an Ubuntu Linux host (22.04/24.04 LTS with 16GB+ RAM) using Jenkins, Nexus, SonarQube, GitLab (local), Minikube, and Helm for Kubernetes deployments.
